ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; What To Do If You Find A Rift!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dana Sterling travelled back in time and saved her past - but has she lost her future? Faced with new enemies, old friends, and parents who barely know her name, can the half-Zentraedi Robotech ace carve out a place for herself in the cosmos? Brenden Fletcher (Motorcrush, Isola) and artist Elmer Damaso (Robotech/Voltron, Speed Racer) continue the first arc of Robotech: Remix!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Elmer Damaso | 1 | B | Cover B | Robert Wilson IV | 2 | C | Cover C | Rico Renzi | 3 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Anatole Leonard, Dana Sterling, Dr. Lang, Exedore, Jack Baker, Karen Penn, Louie Nichols, Lyn Minmei, Max Sterling, Miryia Sterling, Rick Hunter, Rolf Emerson, Sammie Porter, Vince Grant
